metadata.title: CVE-2014-8417 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
ConfBridge in Asterisk 11.x before 11.14.1, 12.x before 12.7.1, and 13.xbefore 13.0.1 and Certified Asterisk 11.6 before 11.6-cert8 allows remoteauthenticated users to (1) gain privileges via vectors related to anexternal protocol to the CONFBRIDGE dialplan function or (2) executearbitrary system commands via a crafted ConfbridgeStartRecord AMI action.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-8417` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

asterisk - 1:13.1.0~dfsg-1ubuntu1
asterisk-config - 1:13.1.0~dfsg-1ubuntu1
asterisk-dahdi - 1:13.1.0~dfsg-1ubuntu1
asterisk-mobile - 1:13.1.0~dfsg-1ubuntu1
asterisk-modules - 1:13.1.0~dfsg-1ubuntu1
asterisk-mp3 - 1:13.1.0~dfsg-1ubuntu1
asterisk-mysql - 1:13.1.0~dfsg-1ubuntu1
asterisk-ooh323 - 1:13.1.0~dfsg-1ubuntu1
asterisk-voicemail - 1:13.1.0~dfsg-1ubuntu1
asterisk-voicemail-imapstorage - 1:13.1.0~dfsg-1ubuntu1
asterisk-voicemail-odbcstorage - 1:13.1.0~dfsg-1ubuntu1
asterisk-vpb - 1:13.1.0~dfsg-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: asterisk package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:13.1.0~dfsg-1ubuntu1').
